item.title: Debugging Bash on Windows
item.description: TODO:(sblack4) finish links when I get internet - I wrote this on an airplane bach from HQ Debugging Bash on Windows Using the WSL and vscode to debug bash scripts on windows bash (in this case the windows subsystem for linux), visual studio code, docker these are a few of my favorite things! is it overkill when your running wsl in a terminal emulator (cmder) I’ve toyed with docker but hadn’t seriously used it for work.
